name: Megaton Ancient Gear Golem
desc:
3 "Ancient Gear" monsters
If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate Spells/Traps until the end of the Damage Step. If this card was Fusion Summoned using 2 or more "Ancient Gear Golem" and/or "Ancient Gear Golem - Ultimate Pound", this card can make a number of attacks each Battle Phase equal to the number of those monsters used. If this face-up Fusion Summoned card leaves the field by an opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Ultimate Ancient Gear Golem" from your Extra Deck, ignoring its Summoning conditions.
